alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Letcher; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Letcher, northeastern Perry, Knott and south central Breathitt Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Talcum, or 7 miles west of Hindman, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ritchie, Carrie, Tina and Vest around 840 PM EDT. Hindman, Vicco, Elic, Anco, Wiscoal, Leburn, Sassafras and Garner around 845 PM EDT. Pippa Passes, Littcarr, Carr Creek, Dirk, Amburgey, Cody, Smithsboro, Spider, Brinkley and Ivis around 850 PM EDT. Letcher, Bath, Blackey, Amelia, Sackett, Isom, Redfox, Colson, Jeremiah and Carbon Glow around 855 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tillie, Polly, Lester, Democrat and Deane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
